{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WL-600g.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11b/g Wireless DSL Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/ADSL_Modem_Routers/WL600g/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_WL-600g |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Was Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = WL-600g |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 7, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_WL-600g |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQWL600G |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 96348GW-10 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6348; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = BMIPS3300 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 256 <!-- 240 / 256 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320CTTC-90G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S641632K-UC60; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG0721 P11, 824058 1A; |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1D:60 |oui = 00:1D:60
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;1.0.37-0.8;(BCM96348); |stockos = Linux;2.6.8.1;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pln header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = USB 2.0 4-port PCI Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;VIA, VT6212L, 0716CD, 23B7034591; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (Was)
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318;BCM4318KFBG, HD0726 P11, 827058 85A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl600g On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?15274-WL-600g-%C4%EE%F0%E0%E1%EE%F2%EA%E0-%EF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%E8-%E4%EB%FF-%F1%E5%F0%E8%E8-ADSL-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0%EE%E2&langid=3&p=219907#post219907 On the '''wl500g.info''' forums] (int. images) :There is a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrtNotice|BCM63xxDSL}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_wl-600g |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl600g |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=7355 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = brcm63xx |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_mips32 |support_started_version = 10.03.1 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/dsl_modem DSL modem] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
